title: Basic breadmaking
brief_description: Techniques of baking yeast bread are demonstrated for white loaf bread; crescent, cloverleaf and twist dinner rolls, also cinnamon rolls. Quick bread techniques are also shown for biscuits and muffins. Time-lapse photography is used during rising and baking processes.
